actions.name: Desert Cloak
actions.description: Effect: While Dusty Weather is active, the user and allies within Range have a 30% chance to not be afflicted with Status Afflictions or [Stage Change] from the attacks and abilities of foes. The user is treated as having the Ground Type for the effects of Dusty Weather.
